Anniversary2019Offering.name: Gruesome Gateau
Anniversary2019Offering.description: A terrific stomach-churning cake to mark our three years together. Grants 103% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Anniversary2020Offering.name: Ghastly Gateau
Anniversary2020Offering.description: A spectacularly grim cake to mark our four years together. 1% tastier than a Gruesome Gateau. Grants 104% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Anniversary2021Offering.name: Sacrificial Cake
Anniversary2021Offering.description: A revolting cake that marks our five years together. The slightest taste fills you with an incomprehensible energy, reaching out to something beyond. Grants 105% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Anniversary2022Offering.name: Frightful Flan
Anniversary2022Offering.description:
It may be a masquerade ball, but there is no masking the foul odor of this quivering yellow mass.

Consuming it, however, fills you with vigor.

Grants 106% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.

Anniversary2023Offering.name: TERRORMISU
Anniversary2023Offering.description:
A celebratory dessert to be eaten during the masquerade. Each layer is more horrifying than the last.

Grants 107% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.Reveals the aura of an Invitation within 32 meter(s).

Anniversary2024Offering.name: SCREECH COBBLER
Anniversary2024Offering.description:
If you listen really closely, you can almost hear it screaming for more ice cream.

Grants 108% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.Reveals the aura of Invitation within 16 meters.Create 1 more chest.

Halloween2021Offering.name: Cursed Seed
Halloween2021Offering.description: Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 tangled hook and 1 tangled generator.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a tangled hook for the first time to earn bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, find and repair a tangled generator to earn bonus Bloodpoints.Using this offering increases the amount of Bloodpoints earned for these interactions.NOTE: During the event, 1 default tangled hook and 1 default tangled generator will spawn on the map.Stacks.Only playable during The Midnight Grove event.

Halloween2022Offering.name: Arcane Dowsing Rod
Halloween2022Offering.description:
Taps into the latent energy of The Entity's realm to find even more concentrated pockets of power.

Personal.Provides a +100% Bloodpoints bonus to all Haunted By Daylight score events.Provides a directional cue when within 24 meters of an Unstable Rift or Portal.Only usable when playing Event: Haunted by Daylight.

HalloweenOffering.name: Pustula Petals
HalloweenOffering.description: Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Blighted Hook and 1 Blighted Generator.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a Blighted Hook for the first time to earn bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, find and repair a Blighted Generator to earn bonus Bloodpoints.Using this offering increases the amount of Bloodpoints earned for these interactions.NOTE: During the event, 1 default Blighted Hook and 1 default Blighted Generator will spawn in the map.Stacks.Only playable during the Midnight Grove Event.

RedMoney.name: Red Envelope
RedMoney.description:
A gesture of generosity to bring good fortune to the unfortunate. Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Red Envelope in the trial.

The aura of your own envelope is revealed to you at the start of the trial.Interacting with your own Red Envelope reveals its aura to all other players in the trial until claimed.Opening another player's Red Envelope awards you with Bloodpoints of a random amount.When another player opens your envelope during the trial, you are awarded Bloodpoints and a cosmetic from the Moonlight Burrow collection.Increased Bloodpoints awarded from Lunar New Year Generators and Hooks.

RottenOak.name: Rotten Oak
RottenOak.description: Calls upon The Entity to Moderately decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.

SacrificalWard.name: Sacrificial Ward
SacrificalWard.description:
Calls upon The Entity to reject all offerings that alter the chance of being sent to a specific realm.

This can only be canceled if four identical realm offerings are played.
